---
title: "exploratory-analysis"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| label: library-import-data-exploration

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

airfare <- read_csv("data/airfare.csv")

airfare_2025q2 <- airfare %>% 
  filter(
    Year == 2025,
    quarter == 2
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    fare = parse_number(fare),
    fare_lg = parse_number(fare_lg),
    fare_low = parse_number(fare_low)
  )


```
